duties_responsibilities.duty: Load the truck and ride with the Driver to the job site to unload building materials safely and efficiently.
Unload roofing materials onto the roof of the building with attention to contractors' needs and homeowners' property.
Work in a physically-demanding, labor-intensive position lifting up to 100 lbs properly, repeatedly, and on a daily basis.
Use basic math skills for inventory counts and communicate verbally and in writing with team members.
Embrace the mindset of the 'Make Money and Have Fun!' culture.
